languages.text: "Годы, Вольный Торговец. Когда я впервые ступила на Летус, мои волосы были, как вороново крыло, а в голове засела тупая уверенность, что я здесь на десяток-другой циклов, не больше. Ничего, Летус выбил из меня дурную привычку надеяться и строить планы, а взамен научил терпению и смирению".

"For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I would be here for a dozen cycles at most. Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."
languages.original_text: "Годы, Вольный Торговец. Когда я впервые ступила на Летус, мои волосы были, как вороново крыло, а в голове засела тупая уверенность, что я здесь на десяток-другой циклов, не больше. Ничего, Летус выбил из меня дурную привычку надеяться и строить планы, а взамен научил терпению и смирению".

traits.locale_text: "For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I came here for a dozen cycles at most. But this is fine, Leethus beat the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me, and taught me patience and humility instead."

"For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I came here for a dozen cycles at most. But this is fine, Leethus beat the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me, and taught me patience and humility instead."

But this is fine. Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

But this is fine. Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

languages.text: «Muchos años, Comerciante. Cuando pisé Leethus por primera vez, mi pelo era como el ala de un cuervo y tenía la absurda convicción de que no pasaría aquí más de diez ciclos. Por suerte, Leethus me ha hecho superar la mala costumbre de tener esperanzas y hacer planes y, en su lugar, me ha inculcado las virtudes de la paciencia y la humildad».
languages.original_text: "For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I would be here for a dozen cycles at most. Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

traits.locale_text: «Muchos años, Comerciante. Cuando pisé Leethus por primera vez, mi pelo era como el ala de un cuervo y tenía la absurda convicción de que no pasaría aquí más de diez ciclos. Por suerte, Leethus me ha hecho superar la mala costumbre de tener esperanzas y hacer planes y, en su lugar, me ha inculcado las virtudes de la paciencia y la humildad».

languages.text: “呆了太久太久，行商浪人。当我第一次踏上利瑟斯的土地时，我的头发还像乌鸦的翅膀一样黑。那个时候，我脑子里装着愚蠢的想法，我以为最多只要在这里呆上十几个周期就够了。值得庆幸的是，利瑟斯改掉了我凡事心怀希望、制定计划的坏习惯，教会了我耐心与谦卑。”
languages.original_text: "For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I would be here for a dozen cycles at most. Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

traits.locale_text: “呆了太久太久，行商浪人。当我第一次踏上利瑟斯的土地时，我的头发还像乌鸦的翅膀一样黑。那个时候，我脑子里装着愚蠢的想法，我以为最多只要在这里呆上十几个周期就够了。值得庆幸的是，利瑟斯改掉了我凡事心怀希望、制定计划的坏习惯，教会了我耐心与谦卑。”

languages.text: 「もう長いことです、ローグトレーダー。私が最初にリーザスに到着したころ、髪の毛はカラスの翼のようでした。そして長くても1ダースのサイクルくらいだろうという馬鹿げた確信が私にはありました。ありがたいことに、リーザスは希望を持つことや計画を立てるといった腐った習慣を私から失わせ、代わりに忍耐と謙虚さを教えてくれました」
languages.original_text: "For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I would be here for a dozen cycles at most. Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

traits.locale_text: 「もう長いことです、ローグトレーダー。私が最初にリーザスに到着したころ、髪の毛はカラスの翼のようでした。そして長くても1ダースのサイクルくらいだろうという馬鹿げた確信が私にはありました。ありがたいことに、リーザスは希望を持つことや計画を立てるといった腐った習慣を私から失わせ、代わりに忍耐と謙虚さを教えてくれました」

languages.text: « Depuis de nombreuses années, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La première fois que j'ai mis les pieds sur Leethus, j'avais les cheveux noir corbeau, et j'étais assez naïve pour croire que je n'y resterais pas plus d'une douzaine de cycles. Par chance, Leethus a eu tôt fait de me débarrasser de cette sale manie qui consiste à espérer et à se projeter dans l'avenir pour mieux m'enseigner la patience et l'humilité. »
languages.original_text: "For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I would be here for a dozen cycles at most. Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis de nombreuses années, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. La première fois que j'ai mis les pieds sur Leethus, j'avais les cheveux noir corbeau, et j'étais assez naïve pour croire que je n'y resterais pas plus d'une douzaine de cycles. Par chance, Leethus a eu tôt fait de me débarrasser de cette sale manie qui consiste à espérer et à se projeter dans l'avenir pour mieux m'enseigner la patience et l'humilité. »

languages.text: "Uzun yıllardır Hür Tacir. Leethus'a adım attığımda saçlarım kapkaraydı. Burada en fazla on döngü kalacağıma çok emindim. Neyse ki Leethus, içimdeki o iğrenç umut etme ve plan yapma alışkanlıklarını söküp attı. Burası bana sabrı ve alçakgönüllülüğü öğretti."
languages.original_text: "For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I would be here for a dozen cycles at most. Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

traits.locale_text: "Uzun yıllardır Hür Tacir. Leethus'a adım attığımda saçlarım kapkaraydı. Burada en fazla on döngü kalacağıma çok emindim. Neyse ki Leethus, içimdeki o iğrenç umut etme ve plan yapma alışkanlıklarını söküp attı. Burası bana sabrı ve alçakgönüllülüğü öğretti."

languages.text: "Seit vielen Jahren, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Als ich nach Leethus kam, glich mein Haar den Flügeln eines Raben und ich war mir törichterweise sicher, dass ich höchstens ein Dutzend Zyklen hier sein würde. Glücklicherweise hat mich Leethus gelehrt, nicht zu hoffen und Pläne zu schmieden, sondern mich in Geduld und Demut zu üben.
languages.original_text: "For many years, Rogue Trader. When I first set foot on Leethus, my hair was like a raven's wing, and there was a stupid certainty in my head that I would be here for a dozen cycles at most. Thankfully, Leethus has beaten the rotten habit of hoping and making plans out of me and taught me patience and humility instead."

Als ich nach Leethus kam, glich mein Haar den Flügeln eines Raben und ich war mir törichterweise sicher, dass ich höchstens ein Dutzend Zyklen hier sein würde. Glücklicherweise hat mich Leethus gelehrt, nicht zu hoffen und Pläne zu schmieden, sondern mich in Geduld und Demut zu üben.
